name: Renatured
description:
Experience the magic of nature's revival with Renatured, a peaceful and enchanting game where you bring life back to a once-dead tree. Nurture its roots and watch as they spread and reach for the essence of life. With each step, the tree will grow, and soon become a thriving ecosystem, teeming with tiny creatures. Immerse yourself in a tranquil world where you can find inner peace and discover the beauty of renewal.

Controls: left click to place roots, right click to rotate, and look up and down by bringing your mouse close to the edge of the screen.

This being a game jam product, we were pressed on time and didn't bother implementing any of that pesky UI, be it menus or a way to exit the game. So if you ever want to leave, you'll need to force quit the game: on mac option+cmd+esc and on Windows alt+f4.

Credits: 

Character Designer & Lead Textures Artist : Noé Aubert

Props Designer & 3D Artist : Sacha Baumgartner

Lead Programmer : Florian Rieder

Technical Artist : Sébastien Rieder

Props Designer & Textures Artist : Tatiana Ruiz

3D & Textures Artist : Valentine Sadoun

Music & Sound Designer : Sacha André

This game was made during the Global Game Jam Geneva 2023.
